abstract: Dandenong - Footage shot in Dandenong during the 1950s.
description: A walk down memory lane in this black and white 1950s footage of the Dandenong Trades Exhibition which includes shots of white goods, furniture and TVs, Holden cars, streetscape images and a fashion parade. Athol Adams footage is courtesy of Jenny and Owen Peake.
